snippet: Daniel Murphy was Santa Claus and Zack Wheeler was an elf during the Mets’ annual holiday party on Tuesday. For some Mets, those roles have spelled bad luck in recent years.
abstract: New York Mets second baseman Daniel Murphy, who has been the subject of trade rumors, dresses up as Santa Claus for team's holiday party; costume has come to be associated with bad luck for team members in recent years, with almost everyone who has played Santa at annual team party having a down season or ending up injured or traded.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Murphy was Santa Claus and Zack Wheeler was an elf during the Mets’ annual holiday party on Tuesday. For some Mets, those roles have spelled bad luck in recent years.

headline.main: Murphy Adds Red Suit and Beard to Itinerant Mets Résumé
headline.print_headline: Murphy Adds Red Suit and Beard to Itinerant Mets Résumé
